title: Hot & Spicy Chicken
description: Spicy chunks of chicken, Hot & Spicy Chicken, capsicums & onions with a double layer of cheese.

title: Cheesy Pizza
description: A rich and creamy blend of mozzarella, cheddar,  baked to perfection on a crispy crust.

title: Meat Lovers
description: Filled high with pepperoni, sausage, ham, bacon, and ground beef. A meat feast on every slice.
